verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Harusi siri kubwa
kweli kwa Mungu,
Wawili kuwa kitu
kimoja ni upendo.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Haya shangilieni tuwaimbieni
sote tuwaombeeni
waishi vyema.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ahadi kwa Mungu
mmetoa timizeni,
upendo uwe msingi imara.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Baraka zake Mungu
ziwe pamoja nanyi,
furaha mpende watoto
Mungu awajalie.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bwana arusi heko
kwa bibi arusi,
Mungu awajalie awajaze
neema.
